HeroSection.title: FullStack Web & Mobile Developer
HeroSection.subtitle: From Colombia, code with coffee aroma.

AboutMe.greeting: Hi, I'm Juan. Nice to meet you.
AboutMe.resume: Since starting my career as a Software Developer over 5 years ago, I've specialized in building web and hybrid mobile solutions for the financial sector, while also gaining valuable experience in IT customer service. I'm highly analytical, deeply curious, and constantly sharpening my skills to adapt and excel in dynamic environments.
